item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 20, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. 100 Years to Solve an Integral (2020) (78 points | 14 comments)
2. Novel color via stimulation of individual photoreceptors at population scale (76 points | 33 comments)
3. Raspberry Pi Lidar Scanner (408 points | 116 comments)
4. Which year: guess which year each photo was taken (38 points | 11 comments)
5. Show HN: I built an AI that turns GitHub codebases into easy tutorials (253 points | 45 comments)
6. Pretty State Machine Patterns in Rust (43 points | 17 comments)
7. Welcome to the Era of Experience [pdf] (54 points | 10 comments)
8. Layered Design in Go (37 points | 4 comments)
9. Librarians are dangerous (468 points | 451 comments)
10. A unique sound alleviates motion sickness (125 points | 47 comments)
11. First baby born in UK to woman with transplanted womb (231 points | 232 comments)
12. Android phones will soon reboot themselves after sitting unused for three days (317 points | 248 comments)
13. Claude Code: Best practices for agentic coding (407 points | 182 comments)
14. Everyone knows your location, Part 2: try it yourself and share the results (108 points | 13 comments)
15. The Web Is Broken – Botnet Part 2 (327 points | 194 comments)
16. Electromagnetism as a Purely Geometric Theory (90 points | 28 comments)

19. Eccfrog512ck2: An Enhanced 512-Bit Weierstrass Elliptic Curve [pdf] (12 points | 1 comment)
20. Cache loop and memory loss in GPT – a user-side fix (tested with GPT itself) (3 points | discuss)
21. Packing Input Frame Context in Next-Frame Prediction Models for Video Generation (239 points | 26 comments)
22. Don't force your kids to do math (125 points | 103 comments)
23. The AI skeptic's guide to AI collaboration (5 points | discuss)
24. Silicon Valley crosswalk buttons apparently hacked to imitate Musk, Zuck voices (323 points | 100 comments)
25. Translate Fortran to C++ with AI and RAG (32 points | 30 comments)
26. An image of the Australian desert illuminates satellite pollution (103 points | 65 comments)
27. Monsky's Theorem (37 points | 11 comments)
28. The Art of Assembly Language (2010) (94 points | 14 comments)
29. Computational Complexity of Air Travel Planning [pdf] (2003) (49 points | 6 comments)
30. Vibe Coding is not an excuse for low-quality work (196 points | 144 comments)
